nextHearing.adjournmentReason: Insufficient court time to hear the case

judicialResults.resultText:
RI - Remanded in custody
Remanded in custody until hearing on a Date and time to be fixed, Liverpool Crown Court. Basis: Charged with a violent or sexual offence. Adjournment reason: Insufficient court time to hear the case. Bail exceptions: Likely to offend - cause injury or fear of injury to an associated person. Reason for applying: Broken bail conditions.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Rydych wedi’ch remandio yn y ddalfa

judicialResults.label: Discretionary with ordinary disqualification
judicialResults.resultText:
DDD - Discretionary with ordinary disqualification
Disqualified for holding or obtaining a driving licence for 6 Months.  Discretionary disqualification. Driving record endorsed. Section 34(2) Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.
judicialResults.resultWording: Disqualified for holding or obtaining a driving licence. Discretionary disqualification. Driving record endorsed. Section 34(2) Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988
